content:
Hello,
My name is Pankaj Sharma, and I am writing to express my interest in the Geometry Verification and Validation UI in Qt project listed for Google Summer of Code.

I hold degrees in Theoretical Physics, with a strong academic background in Mathematics. I have honed my skills in C++17 through rigorous academic pursuits and self-study. I am proficient in implementing fundamental data structures and algorithms, which I believe will be beneficial for this project.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Hello and welcome @Pankaj Sharma you'll want to compile BRL-CAD and see if you can get arbalest running, and then get the prior V&V GUI working to get started. That will help you figure out an appropriate project scope for the details you'd put into your project proposal. Note we just have "ideas" on our list -- you will still have to expand that idea into a viable project based on your skills, experiences, and discoveries. Welcome!
